function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Manual data collection","category":"Data privacy and security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of nvivo software for generating word clouds may lead to misinterpretation of data or bias in the results.","category":"Modeling and simulation risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of quantitative taxonomy-based canberra distance metric without appropriate validation or justification.","category":"Modeling and prediction risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on historical data and assumptions for building energy modeling may not accurately reflect current energy consumption patterns.","category":"Infrastructure and connectivity risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of standardized framework for iot device implementation","category":"Infrastructure and connectivity risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misinterpretation of global and local effects in the mixed gwr model","category":"Modeling and prediction risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of clear distinction in the production of the built environment","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shortage of technical virtual reality experts to develop virtual reality applications suitable for medical education and healthcare.","category":"Healthcare infrastructure and technology adoption risks ","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Movement of people leading to increased dispersal of co2 tracer and aerosols","category":"Healthcare and medical risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of uvgi systems as a substitute for hepa filters in isolation rooms","category":"Healthcare infrastructure and technology adoption risks ","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Connection allocation based on reviewers’ interests and areas of expertise","category":"Operational and implementation risks ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Measured energy consumption of refrigerators","category":"Infrastructure and connectivity risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconvenience and noise of purifying shield","category":"Healthcare and medical risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of fault detection and diagnostics platform.","category":"Operational and implementation risks ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The model collapses to the standard model when ci=0 and bsi=0, potentially leading to inaccurate predictions.","category":"Modeling and prediction risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of unified worldwide plan for wbe development","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor predictive accuracy of model selection","category":"Modeling and prediction risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Web scraping process using java and jsoup library","category":"Data privacy and security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misuse or improper maintenance of uvgi technology","category":"Healthcare infrastructure and technology adoption risks ","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited real-world studies on the application of upper room ultra-violet uv germicidal irradiation","category":"Healthcare infrastructure and technology adoption risks ","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Slow adoption and diffusion of technology and policy changes across the supply chain, especially among less tech-savvy stakeholders","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of linear mixed effects model may not accurately represent the complexity of disease transmission","category":"Modeling and prediction risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of awareness about blockchain and its potential","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Relying on sensor-only estimation of people flow","category":"Infrastructure and connectivity risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Covid-19 analytics","category":"Healthcare and medical risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Perceived lack of usefulness of technology","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Selection of sample size based on unlimited population","category":"Modeling and prediction risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unclear data analysis process and methodology","category":"Data privacy and security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overreliance on traditional citation-based metrics for journal evaluation.","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulty in calculating conditional probability, especially when a disruption occurs for the first time.","category":"Modeling and prediction risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Mobile application collecting time measures and sending them to decision-makers.","category":"Infrastructure and connectivity risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Qualitative research may introduce bias due to subjective approach","category":"Modeling and simulation risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate or random results","category":"Healthcare infrastructure and technology adoption risks ","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"New research streams related to workforce-related issues, project and workplace considerations, procurement and supply chain implications, and contractual, legal, and insurance aspects.","category":"Healthcare and medical risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Technical performance","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Cost of implementing 6g technology","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Underutilized smart solutions","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Deployment of ai and ml for disease prediction and diagnosis may lead to biases in decision-making and inaccurate assessments, impacting treatment and resource allocation.","category":"Artificial intelligence and machine learning risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Relying on wearable devices for early detection of asymptomatic and pre-symptomatic cases of covid-19.","category":"Healthcare and medical risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fluorescent lamp efficiency falling below 70% in uv-c range at low temperatures and airflow","category":"Healthcare infrastructure and technology adoption risks ","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Pandemics leading to an increase in robot adoption over interactions.","category":"Modeling and simulation risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Need for effective online education","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Cities known for adopting technology and innovation","category":"Innovation and adoption risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on wi-fi, bluetooth, and gps for contact identification","category":"Infrastructure and connectivity risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited engagement and utilization of openkg-covid19","category":"Healthcare and medical risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of data analytics for tracking population flow","category":"Data privacy and security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of genetic algorithm to estimate parameters for dynamic model of covid-19 spread.","category":"Modeling and prediction risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Magnified shortcomings in iot technology during the
